document.full_text: marion bartoli of france reached her third semi-final of the year with a 6-4 7-6 victory over former world number one ana ivanovic at the indian wells wta tournament on wednesday.
document.title: bartoli beats ivanovic to reach last four at indian wells
lines_and_colors: marion bartoli of france reached her third semi-final of the year with a 6-4 7-6 victory over former world number one ana ivanovic at the indian wells wta tournament on wednesday.
